title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the answer

V = π r 2 h = π ( 1 2 ) 2 ⋅ 32 = 8 π MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4A77@
descriptions:

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for h = 50

1 point is earned for dv/dt = 0

2 points are earned for differentiation

1 point is earned for r = 2/5

1 point is earned for answer

0 = d V d t = 2 π r h d r d t + π r 2 d h d t ; at  t = 1 ,   h = 50  and so  8 π = π r 2 ⋅ 50 , so  r = 2 5 Therefore  0 = 2 π ( 2 5 ) ( 50 ) d r d t + π ( 2 5 ) 2 ( 18 ) = π ( 40 d r d t + 72 25 ) d r d t = − 9 125 in/min MathType@MTEF@5@5@@ABA7@

or

V = 8 π = π r 2 h ,  so  r = 8 h Therefore  d r d t = 1 2 ( 8 h ) − 1 2 ⋅ ( − 8 h 2 ) ( d h d t ) at  t = 1 ,   h = 50  so d r d t = 1 2 ( 8 50 ) − 1 2 ⋅ ( − 8 2500 ) ( 18 ) = − 9 125 in/min MathType@MTEF@5@5@@98ED@

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for correct integral

1 point is earned for evaluation

1 point is deducted for missing or incorrect unit
